hero.description: Thanks to your collaboration we can help many children in need.

about.title: We help children foodbanks in Argentina.

vision.title: Make donating fast, simple, and transparent through Decentralized Finance (DeFi)

item-1.title: Proactivity
item-1.description: We organize donation campaigns offering benefits for participants and organizations.

item-2.title: Community
item-2.description: We help communities to generate a positive social impact.

item-3.title: Transparency
item-3.description: Blockchain technology allows us to enable you to verify the traceability of your donations.

item-4.title: No borders
item-4.description: Donate from anywhere in the world. Easy and in just a few seconds.
